thing.title: Funnel
thing.author: MaskedRetriever
thing.description: Working on a new gearbox (one where the gears will mesh without scaling them up until the frame no longer fits inside the build area) has me thinking I should wait 'till I can rapid-prototype a few dozen gears and see what does and doesn't work in this department, so I decided to do one last (very very easy) model for the night.Figure a quick search on Thingiverse might save a few other printer users a few minutes scaling and extruding a circle-- this one certainly isn't up here because it's hard to do!This passes the 45-degree overhang rule, too!
